ygData.subject: Re: Qeynos Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail Maraxus: Vhalen Nostrolo is indeed in the Karanas (head south, lad!), and has a tale to spin. However, I believe if you try to garner his aid, he will
ygData.messageBody:
Hail Maraxus:

Vhalen Nostrolo is indeed in the Karanas (head south, lad!), and has a tale
to spin. However, I believe if you try to garner his aid, he will send you
on other unfinishable errands.

Have any other bards been able to complete this task? (You don't need to
give details, just a yea or nae will do.)

-- Jythri, Pencerdd of The Soerbaird
http://www.soerbaird.com



>Has anyone out there completed the quest for the Lisera Lute???
>
>I cannot find Valen in the Karanas anywhere...
>
>Any help on this would be appreicated..
>
>Thanks
>
>Maraxus (lvl 14 Bard)
>
